name: The Last of Cats
description:
Game made for the GDevelop First Game Jam!

made by André Holtz and Willian Holtz

If you want to try it online click the link: https://games.gdevelop-app.com/game-30d93c76-97ca-402f-8828-dc241d561aa9/index.h...

(Please be patient on the loading screen on browser version)

 I can’t upload  a web version at itch Io. It said the project have more than 1k files. So I leave the link to play directly on GDevelop server.

WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO DOWNLOAD THE DESKTOP VERSION FOR BETTER EXPERIENCE!

The aliens invaded the Earth and took your humans. You need to save them and REBUILD the relationship with your family.

"The best game ever" - Devs Mom and Dad

"We finally found intelligent life on Earth" - Aliens 

"I'm the BEST in the world" - Cat, the protagonist

"REBUILDING A RELATIONSHIP WITH YOUR FAMILY IS THE BEST THING YOU CAN DO TODAY. GO AHEAD."

CONTENT
  • Defeat a lot of monsters;
  • Make your character BUILD;
  • Buy and equip new weapons;
  • Defeat challenging bosses;
  • Have fun with beautiful visuals.
CREDITS
  • All musics are from Pixabay Music (license: https://pixabay.com/pt/service/license/)
  • Sound Effects: Creative Commons 0
  • Story Comics Background: Designed by Starline / Freepik - http://www.freepik.com
  • Forgot someone? Pease contact me.
